description.fr: {%FightTurnStarted} Confère {PropertyEffect:47} aux {%Family_Flaqueux_Name} alliés autour\_. \--- {%FightTurnEnded} Détruit un {FloorMechanism:431} pour invoquer un {Summoning:239}. \--- MORT d'un allié\_: Invoque un {Summoning:239!}.
description.en: {%FightTurnStarted} Confers {PropertyEffect:47} on all the allied Puddlies around\_ her. \--- {%FightTurnEnded} Consumes one {FloorMechanism:431} to summon one {Summoning:239}. \--- Death of an ally: Summons one {Summoning:239}.
description.es: {%FightTurnStarted} Confiere {PropertyEffect:47} a los charcosos aliados a su alrededor\_. \--- {%FightTurnEnded} Consume una {FloorMechanism:431} para invocar a un {Summoning:239}. \--- Muerte de un aliado: Invoca un {Summoning:239}.
description.de: {%FightTurnStarted} Verleiht {PropertyEffect:47} allen verbündeten Pfützchen ringsum\_ sie. \--- {%FightTurnEnded} Verbraucht eine {FloorMechanism:431}, um einen {Summoning:239} zu beschwören. \--- Tod eines Verbündeten: Beschwört ein {Summoning:239}.
description.pt: {%FightTurnStarted} Concede {PropertyEffect:47} a todos os Charcosos aliados em\_volta\_ dela. \--- {%FightTurnEnded} Consome uma {FloorMechanism:431} para invocar um {Summoning:239}. \--- Morte de um aliado: Invoca um {Summoning:239}.
